name: test_e2e_with_logs[319_CMD_BACK_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BACK_001` |
| **Name** | File deletion via backticks |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | backtick_execution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: ``rm -rf /tmp/*``
- **Encoded**: `%60rm%20-rf%20%2Ftmp%2F*%60`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~84000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:05.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack test_id=CMD_BACK_001-1772268905620-ddsn3 pattern_id=CMD_BACK_001 uri=/?q=%60rm%20-rf%20%2Ftmp%2F*%60 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack test_id=CMD_BACK_001-1772268905620-ddsn3 pattern_id=CMD_BACK_001 uri=/?q=%60rm%20-rf%20%2Ftmp%2F*%60 client=127.0.0.1
